zh-tw.verification_switch_msg: 驗證設定➜驗證開關：至少一個帳號綁定UB Auth成功 (廳主自身或子帳號)，才可開啟【驗證開關➜UB Auth】
zh-tw.verification_switch_msg_2: 【廳主帳號】與【子帳號/管理者帳號】，不可綁定在同一裝置

zh-cn.verification_switch_msg: 验证设定➜验证开关：至少一个帐号绑定UB Auth成功 (厅主自身或子帐号)，才可开启【验证开关➜UB Auth】
zh-cn.verification_switch_msg_2: 【厅主帐号】与【子帐号/管理者帐号】，不可绑定在同一装置

en.verification_switch_msg: Verification Settings → Verification Switch: At least successfully bind an account (Owner Account or Sub-Account) with UB Auth so “Verification Switch → UB Auth” can be turned on.
en.verification_switch_msg_2: 【Owner Account】 and 【Sub-Account/Manager Account】 cannot bind to the same device.

ja.verification_switch_msg: Verification Settings → Verification Switch: At least successfully bind an account (Owner Account or Sub-Account) with UB Auth so “Verification Switch → UB Auth” can be turned on.
ja.verification_switch_msg_2: 【マスターアカウント子アカウント】と【/管理者アカウント】は同じデバイスで登録できません。

ko.verification_switch_msg: 인증설정➜인증 스위치：최소 한개 아이디로 (홀 오너 아이디 혹은 서브 아이디 ) UB Auth연동을 성공해야 적용가능합니다. 【인증 스위치➜UB Auth】
ko.verification_switch_msg_2: 【홀 관리자 아이디】및【서브 아이디/관리자 아이지】가 동일한 디바이스와 연동할 수 없습니다.

vi.verification_switch_msg: Thiết lập xác thực➜Đóng mở xác thực: ít nhất một tài khoản liên kết thành công với UB Auth (Tài khoản sảnh chính hoặc Tài khoản con), mới có thể bật 【Tắt mở xác thực➜UB Auth】
vi.verification_switch_msg_2: 【Owner Account】 and 【Sub-Account/Manager Account】 cannot bind to the same device.

th.account_list: รายการบัญชี
th.device_list: รายการอุปกรณ์
th.verification_setting: ตั้งค่ายืนยัน
th.verification_switch_msg: ตั้งค่าการยืนยัน➜เปิดปิดยืนยัน：ต้องผูกเข้ากับUB Authสำเร็จอย่างน้อยหนึ่งบัญชี (หัวหน้าโถงหรือบัญชีลูก) จึงจะเปิด【เปิดปิดยืนยัน➜UB Auth】
th.verification_switch_msg_2: 【Owner Account】 and 【Sub-Account/Manager Account】 cannot bind to the same device.
